content.question: Based on the diagram, which of the following is one way that the Zika virus can be spread within the human population?

choices.label: From a mother to her unborn child

content.answer: From a mother to her unborn child

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
